benzene, thinner, ammonia, abrasive cleaners, alcohol, compressed air. : directly spray cleaning solution even water directly surface monitor. allow liquids accumulate bottom display panel corrode electronics resulting permanent damage. instead, apply cleaning solution water soft cloth clean monitor. : using chemicals cleaning may cause changes appearance monitor, color fading, milky film monitor, deformation, uneven dark shade, screen surface peeling. : monitor damages due improper cleaning methods use benzene, thinner, ammonia, abrasive cleaners, alcohol, compressed air, detergent kind lead customer induced damage (). covered standard dell warranty. ‚Ä¢ notice white powder unpack monitor, wipe cloth. ‚Ä¢ handle monitor care darker-colored monitor may get scratched show white scuff marks lighter-colored monitor. ‚Ä¢ help maintain best image quality monitor, use dynamically changing screen saver turn monitor use. 32 | setting monitor : stand riser stand base detached monitor shipped factory.

safety instructions cleaning monitor. handling monitor: ‚Ä¢ clean anti-static screen, lightly dampen soft, clean cloth water. possible, use special screen-cleaning tissue solution suitable anti-static coating. use benzene, thinner, ammonia, abrasive cleaners, compressed air. ‚Ä¢ use lightly-dampened, soft cloth clean monitor. avoid using detergent kind detergents leave milky film monitor. ‚Ä¢ notice white powder unpack monitor, wipe cloth. ‚Ä¢ handle monitor care darker-colored monitor may get scratched show white scuff marks lighter- colored monitor. ‚Ä¢ help maintain best image quality monitor, use dynamically changing screen saver turn monitor use. 26 | setting monitor : stand riser stand base detached monitor shipped factory. : procedure applicable default stand. purchased stand, see documentation shipped stand set up. : place monitor flat, clean, soft surface avoid scratching display panel. attach monitor stand: ‚Ä¢ remove monitor protective cover place monitor front facing downward it. ‚Ä¢

reserved. purchased divx video-on-demand () movies. obtain registration code, locate divx section device setup menu. go vod.divx.com information complete registration. terminology 480i / 480p / 720p / 1080i / 1080p____ scanning rates refers number effective scanning lines decides screen resolution. scanning rate may indicated (interlaced) p (progressive), depending scanning method. - scanningscanning refers process sending pixels form image progressively. larger number pixels deliver clearer vivid picture. - progressivein progressive scan mode, lines pixels scanned one one (progressively) screen. - interlacedin interlaced scan mode, every line pixels scanned top bottom first remaining lines pixels (that scanned) scanned.non-interlace mode interlace mode____ non-interlace mode (progressive scan) displays horizontal line top bottom screen progressively. interlace mode displays odd number lines first even number lines next. non-interlace mode mainly used monitors produces screen clarity

sending pixels form image progressively. larger number pixels deliver clearer vivid picture. - progressivein progressive scan mode, lines pixels scanned one one (progressively) screen. - interlacedin interlaced scan mode, every line pixels scanned top bottom first remaining lines pixels (that scanned) scanned.non-interlace mode interlace mode____ non-interlace mode (progressive scan) displays horizontal line top bottom screen progressively. interlace mode displays odd number lines first even number lines next. non-interlace mode mainly used monitors produces screen clarity interlace mode mainly used tvs. shorter distance dots produces higher resolution. dot pitch refers distance shortest distance dots colour. dot pitch measured millimeters.vertical frequency____ product displays single image many times per second (like fluorescent light flickers) display image viewer see. rate single image displayed repeatedly per second called vertical frequency refresh rate. vertical frequency
